text_block_list.text:
―A summer training camp to strengthen 
her abilities. This is the perfect chance 
for Haru Urara to get stronger, but…

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Wow, so much nature! 
The sky seems so high up!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe, we're all staying over! 
I've been looking forward to this for so long!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's the sea! 
I can see a little bit of it from here!

… Is she going to be fine? 
Even though I'm a little worried, 
the summer camp has begun!
